heading: Wednesday Night
text: Mostly cloudy. Scattered snow showers, except slight chance southeast, and numerous in the northern mountains, with a trace to 2 inches. Lows in the upper 20s to lower 30s, some mid 30s near Lake Champlain. Southwest winds 5 mph or less, except 5 to 10 mph in the Champlain and St. Lawrence valleys.

heading: Thursday
text: Mostly cloudy. Scattered to numerous snow showers in the mountains, with a trace to 2 inches; scattered snow or rain showers in the valleys, with less than an inch. Highs in the low to mid 40s in the south, and mid 30s to around 40s north. West winds 5 to 10 mph.

heading: Thursday Night
text: Mostly cloudy, with snow showers north, with a trace to an inch in the valleys, and 1 to 3 inches over high terrain. Lows from the mid 20s to around 30, except lower 20s in the Adirondacks. Northwest winds 5 to 10 mph.
